item.description:
Look for the group at the tall tables just behind the reception area.

Just now UPDATED:

The video link below of Prof. Christopher Busby's speech at the esteemed Royal Academy (London) was recently blocked (forbid access) but let us practice our memories & see if we can reconstruct what he said in the introductory 5 minutes of the video, leading to further discussion. This video was still "up" on this Snob Meetup posted, for at least 2 months; so many of you have seen it. Personally I remember a couple of key points.

We'll have reserved tables behind the reception area. Please be on time to get seats. Please feel free to exchange seats & mingle. PLEASE BRING CASH & avoid running up tabs!

"Theme of this particular meetup is-- at least
watch the first 5 minutes of":
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=dOI-wpMlq28

You don't have to be a genuine Intellectual-- pseudo-intellectual Snobs are also welcome.

All you need is an aloof attitude full of irony or some baffling ideas, or-- dare I say it-- some unanswered question you wish to convey incognito.

Humor in good taste-- ALLOWED. Intellectual apparel: allowed. Startle the waitstaff with a fake mustache, goatee, Periwig, or monocle. Fold-up sunglasses, corduroy jackets with elbow patches-- allowed. No Meerschaum tobacco pipes, please. Absinthe is not served.
item.how_to_find_us: Reserved tall tables just behind the reception area
item.name: Intellectual Snobs Meetup: Research Objectivity & Policymaking-- Sans Video
